channel.title: Qr Code on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours
channel.description: Recent content in Qr Code on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours

item.title: Creating vCards with QR Codes
item.description: Recently I’ve been noticing a lot more use of QR codes around the internet. A QR code is those 2D matrices that look like a bar code, but aren’t just the ordinary vertical lines that you would see on your box of cereal. These are a box that contain pixels that have been coded to contain information about pretty much anything. I’ve been seeing some people using them for contact information, web links, and pretty much anything you can think of to distribute information.
